Sentence.Original:
[1][0]Teddy Bear Teddy Bear Teddy Bear Teddy Bear Teddy Bear Teddy Bear[2][0]The teddy bear stolen from my bag.
Mom and Dad got it for me on my third birthday, so it's really special.[3][0][4][5][0][6][7][0][8][9][0][10][11][0][12]

[1][0]Cool Pop Cool Pop Cool Pop Cool Pop Cool Pop Cool Pop[2][0]A soft drink bought at the guesthouse.
It's got a lovely lemon flavour and it's my favourite![3][0][4]

[1][0]Token Token Token Token Token Token[2][0]A token from the can recycling machine.
It has the Lake Juliet logo on it.[3][0][4]

[1][0]Charcoal Charcoal Charcoal Charcoal Charcoal Charcoal[2][0]Charcoal from the guesthouse.
It's for the barbecue.[3][0][4]

[1][0]Campsite ID Card Campsite ID Card Campsite ID Card Campsite ID Card Campsite ID Card Campsite ID Card[2][0]ID card from the guesthouse.
I need this to open the gate to the campsite.[3][0]ID card from the guesthouse.
Used to open the gate to the campsite and also to pay at the guesthouse shop.[4][0][5]
[1][0]Crisps Crisps Crisps Crisps Crisps Crisps[2][0]Crisps bought at the guesthouse.[3][0][4]

[1][0]Sayoko's Pendant Sayoko's Pendant Sayoko's Pendant Sayoko's Pendant Sayoko's Pendant Sayoko's Pendant[2][0]Mom's pendant.
A precious keepsake from Mom.[3][0]Mnemonic fluid with Mom's memories.
Given to Mom 13 years ago by Elizabeth's dad at the clock tower.[4][0][5]

[1][0]Pink Music Player Elizabeth's Music Player Elizabeth's Music Player Elizabeth's Music Player Elizabeth's Music Player Elizabeth's Music Player[2][0]Music player found in the shack.
Is it Elizabeth's?[3][0]Music player found in the shack.
It must belong to Elizabeth.[4][0][5]

[1][0]DAS DAS DAS DAS DAS DAS[2][0]A device made by Dad.
Can be used to read messages sent from Dad's network and take pictures.[3][0]A device made by Dad.
After connecting it to Dad's laptop, it is now able to view security camera feeds.[4][0]A device made by Dad.
Has messaging and camera functions. It views security camera feeds from the lab.[5][0][6]

[1][0]Plasters Plasters Plasters Plasters Plasters Plasters[2][0]Plasters from Dad's cottage.
Maybe they can be used for something else...[3][0][4]
[1][0]Beef Jerky Beef Jerky Beef Jerky Beef Jerky Beef Jerky Beef Jerky[2][0]Beef jerky bought at the guesthouse.

[1][0]Matthew's Family Photo Matthew's Family Photo Matthew's Family Photo Matthew's Family Photo Matthew's Family Photo Matthew's Family Photo[2][0]Picture of Matthew's family.
Looks like something's written on the back...[3][0][4]

[1][0]Orange Cool Pop Orange Cool Pop Orange Cool Pop Orange Cool Pop Orange Cool Pop Orange Cool Pop[2][0]Cool Pop bought by Dad.
I've been waiting to try the new orange flavour![3][0][4]

That was great! I can recycle this at the can recycling machine.[3][0][4]

[1][0]Fishing Rod Fishing Rod Fishing Rod Fishing Rod Fishing Rod Fishing Rod[2][0]A fishing rod from the researchers' room.
It's well made and looks really expensive...[3][0][4]

[1][0]Toy Car Toy Car Toy Car Toy Car Toy Car Toy Car[2][0]A toy car found inside the bag at the lake.
